lines.text: Well, I want to say it could've had something to do with the ritual...
Like, maybe they summoned something that was able to hold him in place...
Or, hey, maybe they used the circle itself to bind Slick, instead of a demon!
But... from the looks of the table, it doesn't look like they ever actually got anything started.
And thank god for that. The last thing I need is demons involved with this case.
